shortcode.single: [feedzy-rss feeds='https://s3.amazonaws.com/downloads.themeisle.com/sample-feed.xml' max='11' offset='1' feed_title='yes' refresh='1_hours' meta='yes' multiple_meta='yes' summary='yes' price='yes' mapping='price=im:price' thumb='yes' keywords_title='God, Mendes, Cyrus, Taylor' keywords_ban='Cyrus' template='style1']
shortcode.lazy: [feedzy-rss feeds='https://s3.amazonaws.com/downloads.themeisle.com/sample-feed.xml' max='11' offset='1' feed_title='yes' refresh='1_hours' meta='yes' multiple_meta='yes' summary='yes' price='yes' mapping='price=im:price' thumb='yes' keywords_title='God, Mendes, Cyrus, Taylor' keywords_ban='Cyrus' template='style1' lazy='yes']
shortcode.multiple: [feedzy-rss feeds='https://s3.amazonaws.com/downloads.themeisle.com/sample-feed-multiple1.xml, https://s3.amazonaws.com/downloads.themeisle.com/sample-feed-multiple2.xml' max='10' feed_title='no' refresh='1_hours' meta='yes' multiple_meta='yes' summary='yes' thumb='yes' template='style1']

import-feed.title: [#item_date] [#item_custom_guid] [#item_title]
